plant.question: I have roots, but no feet. I wear a coat of green. I make food, but have no mouth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow from the ground.
☀️ I need sunshine to live.
🌳 Big or small, I am a friend to all.

plant.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
👀 You can see my green top.
😋 I am a healthy snack.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when it gets hot. I am often eaten at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am a type of corn.
🔥 I need heat to transform.
🎬 I am a popular snack.

plant.question: I have a head and a beard, but no face. People like to eat me in soup. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I grow underground.
😭 Cutting me can make you cry.
🍲 I add flavor to food.

plant.question: I have many seeds, but I am not a watermelon. I am red, juicy, and round. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am often used in salads.
🍕 I make a great sauce for pizza.
🔴 I am a fruit, but often eaten as a vegetable.

plant.question: I am a vine that produces a sour juice. People love me frozen in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🥤 I can be used to make drinks.
💜 I am often purple or green.

plant.question: I have needles, but I cannot sew. I can stand very tall and stay green all year. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 Many are decorated in December.
🐻 Pinecones fall from me.
⛰️ I often grow in mountains.

plant.question: I am a grain used to make bread. I am harvested in golden fields. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am a staple food in many countries.
🍞 I am often ground into flour.
☀️ I need sunshine to grow.

plant.question: I am a colorful flower, but I have no scent. People like to give me as a gift, even though I’m fake. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I am made from plastic or paper.
🪷 I never needs water or sunlight.
🏠 I am often used for decoration.

plant.question: I am a plant that can live for thousands of years. I am found in deserts and store water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I have spines to protect myself.
🏜️ I am adapted to hot and dry environments.
💧 I can survive long periods without rain.

food.question: I am long and yellow, and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a favorite snack of primates.
📏 I am often curved.
💛 My color is often associated with happiness.

food.question: I am round and red, juicy and sweet. Doctors say I keep them away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
🥧 I am used in pies.
🍎 Snow White ate one.

food.question: I am white, and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am a liquid.
🐮 I am produced by mammals.
🦴 I am good for your bones.

food.question: I am small and green, often served in a pod. You might find me in a soup. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow in the ground.
🥗 I can be a side dish.
💚 I am the same color as grass.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy, a favorite snack of rabbits. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👁️ Eating me is good for your eyesight.
🐇 Bugs Bunny loves me.

food.question: I am made of grains, you can slice me and put things in between. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can make toast with me.
🥪 I am used to make sandwiches.
🌾 I am baked in an oven.

food.question: I am a yellow spread made from churned cream. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I am made from milk.
🧈 You might spread me on toast.
🍿 You might put me on popcorn

food.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. You can add butter and salt to me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a cob.
🍿 You often eat me at the movies.
🔥 Heat transforms me.

food.question: I'm a tropical fruit with a tough, spiky skin and sweet, yellow flesh. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow in warm climates.
🍍 My name sounds like a different kind of tree mixed with the end of apple
🍹 I am often in tropical drinks.

food.question: I am a long, thin noodle, often served with sauce. I come in many shapes and sizes and am a staple of Italian cuisine. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I'm originally from Italy.
🍝 Spaghetti is one of my forms.
🍅 I am frequently paired with tomato sauce.
